verses.text: More like Jesus as we go, Let our lives and conduct show Let our Saviour's love with joy Fill our hearts from day to day.
More like Jesus let us be, Till our blessed Lord we see; Take the world, the flesh, and all, That may tempt us to fall.
More like Jesus, day by day, May we walk the narrow way; Till we reach the golden shore, Where the saved shall part no more.
More like Jesus, while we pray, More like Jesus, day by day; Till we reach the shining shore, Where the saved shall part no more.

chorus.text: More like Jesus would I be, Let my Saviour dwell in me; Fill my soul with peace and love, Make me gentle as a dove.
